```{r importData}
trainData <- read.csv("train.csv")

head(trainData)

```

```{r addUtilityFunctions ----clears all data}
panel.hist <- function(x, ...)
{
    usr <- par("usr"); on.exit(par(usr))
    par(usr = c(usr[1:2], 0, 1.5) )
    h <- hist(x, plot = FALSE)
    breaks <- h$breaks; nB <- length(breaks)
    y <- h$counts; y <- y/max(y)
    rect(breaks[-nB], 0, breaks[-1], y, col = "cyan", ...)
}
```

```{r removeOutliers - clears all data}
trainData <- trainData[trainData$build_year >= 1691,]
trainData <- trainData[trainData$build_year <= 2018,]
trainData <- trainData[trainData$full_sq <= 5000,]
trainData <- trainData[trainData$kitch_sq <= 1500,]
trainData <- trainData[trainData$life_sq <= 1000,]
trainData <- trainData[trainData$state <= 4,]
```

```{r dataAnalysis}
pairs(~price_doc+full_sq+life_sq+floor+max_floor+material+build_year+num_room+kitch_sq+state,data=trainData, 
   main="Simple Scatterplot Matrix", diag.panel=panel.hist)
```

```{r dataAnalysis}
library(tidyverse)

str(trainData)

ggplot(data = trainData)+
  geom_histogram(mapping= aes(x= logprice), binwidth = 5)

trainData %>%
  count(full_sq())


require(stats)
  plot(trainData)
  lines(lowess(trainData))
  
  
nrow(trainData)


```

```{r missing values}
library(tidyverse)


logprice = log(trainData$price_doc) 
logfull_sq = log(trainData$full_sq)
loglife = log(trainData$life_sq)
logfloor = log(trainData$floor)
logmaxfl = log(trainData$max_floor)
logmaterial = log(trainData$material)
lognumroom = log(trainData$num_room)
logkitsq = log(trainData$kitch_sq)
logstate = log(trainData$state)


head(trainData)

 
```


```{r dataAnalysis}

pairs(~logprice+full_sq+life_sq+floor+build_year+
        num_room+kitch_sq+state,data=trainData, 
   main="Log Transformed Scatterplot Matrix", diag.panel=panel.hist)

```
